item.description:
Hello,

I want to invite you to these seminars as they are being taught by a very special Teacher, her name is Mother Clare Watts. She comes in from Colorado thus there is a fee to cover her airfare. Please join me.

Here is the blurb...
Intuition as a Spiritual Sense
All of us have experienced intuition in both obvious and subtle ways. Intuition is that 'knowing' that you can't explain, that 'sense' of something that feels right and proves to be true. how is intuition a spiritual sense? Can intuition be developed? What role does intuition play in our lives? Come and hear how you can develop and strengthen your knowing to bring more joy, power and peace into your life.
7 pm $25

See you there,

Rev Gabrielle
item.name: Seminar: Intuition as a Spiritual Sense
